placeholders.title_main: We need an agency‑wide AI framework
placeholders.subtitle: To compete, reduce risk, and ship faster

deck_slides.layout_name: B&W Background, B&W Text, Numbered List

placeholders.body_bullets:
Initiative recap
5‑month learnings
Iterate vision
Path forward

deck_slides.layout_name: Black Background, White Text, Statement Slide
White Background, Black Text, Content (Non-Bulleted)

placeholders.title_main: What we set out to do
placeholders.body_non_bullets: In early 2025 we launched an agile AI initiative organized around five pillars to pilot use-cases, de-risk experimentation, and inform a scalable operating model. We formed a lightweight working group, defined sprint cadences, and aligned on success metrics to guide investment.

deck_slides.layout_name: White Background, Black Text, Title and Table

placeholders.subtitle: What, why, owner, maturity
placeholders.content_table:
Pillar | Purpose | Example Use‑Case | Owner | Maturity (1–5)
Research/Insights | Faster synthesis | Brief mining | [Name] | 2
Creative Assist | Concept velocity | Ad comps | [Name] | 3
Production Ops | Throughput | Versioning | [Name] | 2
Data & Models | Quality & control | Prompt libs | [Name] | 2
Governance | Risk & standards | Review gates | [Name] | 1

deck_slides.layout_name: B&W Split Background, B&W Split Text, Before-After w/ 1 Text Box Each

placeholders.body_left: 5 pillar sprints; simple KPIs; shared playbook; lightweight governance; phased tooling.
placeholders.body_right: Uneven pillar progress; ad‑hoc metrics; pockets of great practice; limited standards; tooling sprawl risk.

deck_slides.layout_name: Black Background, White Text, Statement Slide
White Background, Black Text, Two Titles two Content Boxes (Non-Bulleted) w/ Header

placeholders.content_left_non_bullets: Model releases are accelerating; quality leaps (multimodal, agents); rapid commoditization of basic tasks.
placeholders.content_right_non_bullets: Peer agency touchpoints; client expectations rising; AI‑native competitors redefining scope and speed.

deck_slides.layout_name: White Background, Black Text, Two Titles two Content Boxes (Non-Bulleted) w/ Header

placeholders.content_left_non_bullets: Team sophistication varies; promising agent/gem experiments; appetite for guidance and reusable patterns.
placeholders.content_right_non_bullets: Senior stakeholder interest; need clearer guardrails; my bandwidth constraints expose need for formal program.

deck_slides.layout_name: White Background, Black Text, Three Column Comparison (Non-Bulleted)

placeholders.content_left_non_bullets: AI‑Native Firms: Productized accelerators; specialized talent; faster cycles; narrow but deep offerings.
placeholders.content_middle_non_bullets: Hybrid Agencies: Blending AI into workflows; emerging governance; advantage where change mgmt is strong.
placeholders.content_right_non_bullets: Traditional Agencies: Case‑by‑case pilots; slower standardization; risk of margin compression.

deck_slides.layout_name: Black Background, White Text, Statement Slide w/ Subtitle
B&W Background, B&W Text, Numbered List

placeholders.body_bullets:
Speed to value
Quality uplift
Cost leverage
Risk control
Differentiation

deck_slides.layout_name: White Background, Black Text, Three Column Comparison (Non-Bulleted) w/ Header

placeholders.content_left_non_bullets: Governance: Standards, approvals, data/privacy controls, vendor policy, model usage guidelines.
placeholders.content_middle_non_bullets: Capabilities: Skills ladder, prompts/patterns, agent/gem library, training pathways, QA.
placeholders.content_right_non_bullets: Products: Reusable tools, client‑facing accelerators, packaged services, measurement.

deck_slides.layout_name: Black Background, White Text, Statement Slide
White Background, Black Text, Two Titles two Content Boxes (Non-Bulleted) w/ Header

placeholders.content_left_non_bullets: Formal ongoing program led by me; set roadmap; define standards; report outcomes.
placeholders.content_right_non_bullets: One champion per department; co‑design tools/gems; gather use‑cases; drive adoption.

deck_slides.layout_name: White Background, Black Text, Three Column Comparison (Bulleted)

placeholders.content_left_bullets:
Audit
Deep skills survey
Tool inventory
placeholders.content_middle_bullets:

In‑person by dept
Playbooks + demos

placeholders.content_left_non_bullets: Data leakage; model drift; bias; compliance gaps; vendor lock‑in; reputational risk.
